name: Cetacea (Misdirectiongames)
description:
Cetacea is a visual novel made for SuNoFes22, that follows the story of a band of whales during the Whale Squid Wars.

Click or Enter to advance.

We hope you enjoy!

Credits:

Coding - Aaron Maus

Art - Daniel Cooper

Story - J.B. Woodward

Opening Theme by TimGrim (https://freesound.org/people/edtijo/)
